item.title: CVE-2024-31262|2024-04-12T12:53:08.244Z -- Jcodex -- WooCommerce Checkout Field Editor (Checkout Manager)
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jcodex WooCommerce Checkout Field Editor (Checkout Manager).This issue affects WooCommerce Checkout Field Editor (Checkout Manager): from n/a through 2.1.8.
